have p : i + k + 1 - i = k + 1 := by omega
          rw [p]
          rw [getElem?_cons_succ, getElem?_drop]
          congr 1
          omega
        · rw [length_take]
          exact Nat.le_trans (Nat.min_le_left _ _) (by omega)
  · rw [set_eq_of_length_le]
    omega
theorem drop_set_of_lt (a : α) {i j : Nat}
